Supplementation: Transcriptional targeting with LAT region enhancer

Expression Duration: 8-12 weeks for AAV component; 5-7 days for LNP component
Additional Notes: Strategy targets both latently infected neurons in dorsal root ganglia and active replication in epithelial tissues. The dual delivery approach provides immediate knockdown via LNPs while establishing longer-term expression via AAV. Tissue-specific promoters minimize off-target effects. Consider cyclophosphamide pre-treatment to reduce neutralizing antibodies in previously exposed patients.
